DOC.brief_summary: Very little known potential preventing prevalence shoulder complaint handball player , particularly young player . The aim study evaluate effect shoulder training program shoulder pain season team handball .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Shoulder Training Program Prevent Shoulder Pain Among Girls Junior Team Handball
DOC.detailed_description: Six team , consist 13 25 player , randomize two group throughout competition season . Three team participate seven -- month , three -- time -- -- week shoulder -- muscle strength -- training program three team participate comparable handball training program conduct specific upper -- body strength training . Effects strength -- training program evaluate compare pre -- post -- training data survey shoulder complaint base self -- report questionnaire ( quick DASH ) Visual Analogue Scale ( VAS ) . The player complete VAS pain month . In addition player test maximum push test , dynamometer test internal external rotation strength shoulder throw distance pre- posttest .
